assignments.description: For Post Point the L1 Approver is the Users Manager. Do this here to allow reuse of the Approval process for other Licence Types
assignments.name: Assign_User_Manager_as_Level_1_Approver
assignments.label: Assign User Manager as Level 1 Approver

Flow.description: Flow called from custom 'Submit for Approval' button on Agreement Document record. Performs validation then calls appropriate Approval Process

formulas.description: If Facility Timing record updated since Document Generation date, then return string.
formulas.name: FacilityTimingUpdatedMessage

formulas.description: If Facility updated since Document Generation date, then return string.
formulas.name: FacilityUpdatedText

formulas.description: If Legal Entity Contact updated since Document Generation date, then return string.
formulas.name: LegalEntityContactUpdatedText

formulas.description: Formula to return a list of all objects that have been updated since the Document Generation date
formulas.name: LegalEntityUpdatedText

formulas.description: If Licence updated since Document Generation date, then return string.
formulas.name: LicenceUpdatedText

formulas.description: If Loan updated since Document Generation date, then return string.
formulas.name: LoanUpdatedText

formulas.description: If Network updated since Document Generation date, then return string.
formulas.name: NetworkUpdatedText
PartnerInfoChangeMessage
formulas.expression: IF({!PartnerInfoChangeFacilityId}<>"",IF({!PartnerInfoChangeLicenceId}<>"","There is a pending Partner Info Change record against the Licence and the Facility.","There is a pending Partner Info Change record against the Facility."),"There is a pending Partner Info Change record against the Licence.")

Flow.label: Agree Mgt - Submit Approval

recordLookups.description: Lookup and assign State Regional Manager as the Level 2 Approver
recordLookups.name: Get_Grandparent_Network
recordLookups.label: Get Grandparent Network

recordLookups.description: Get the Network from the Licence > Parent Network
recordLookups.name: Get_Network
recordLookups.label: Get Network

recordLookups.description: Query to see if any Partner Info Change records against the Licence
recordLookups.name: Get_Partner_Info_Change_Records
recordLookups.label: Get Partner Info Change Records

recordLookups.description: Lookup and assign State RNP Manager as the Level 1 Approver
recordLookups.name: Get_State_RNP_Manager
recordLookups.label: Get State RNP Manager

fields.name: FaultMessage
fields.fieldText: Sorry, an error occurred in the flow. For help, provide your flow administrator with the following information: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: MsgFault2
fields.fieldText: Sorry, an error occurred in the flow. For help, provide your flow administrator with the following information: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: MsgFault3
fields.fieldText: Sorry, an error occurred in the flow. For help, provide your flow administrator with the following information: {!$Flow.FaultMessage}

fields.name: LicenceStatusMsg2
fields.fieldText: The Licence Status must be either Approved, Active, Suspended With Fees, or Suspended Without Fees before submitting the Agreement Document for approval.

screens.name: Message_Agreement_Effective_From_Date_in_Past
screens.label: Message Agreement Effective From Date in Past

fields.name: MsgAgreeDate
fields.fieldText: The 'Agreement Effective From Date' must be greater than or equal to today before submitting the record for approval.

fields.name: MsgApprovalNotRequired
fields.fieldText: Approval is not required for this Document Type.

fields.name: MsgRecordHasBeenSubmitted
fields.fieldText: The record has been submitted for approval.

fields.name: MsgDocTypeNotSet
fields.fieldText: The Document Type must be populated before submitting for pre approval.

fields.name: MsgFullInWrongStatus
fields.fieldText: The record must be in New or Draft status before submitting for approval.

fields.name: LicenceStatusMsg
fields.fieldText: The Licence Status must be either Approved, Active, Suspended With Fees, or Suspended Without Fees before submitting the Agreement Document for approval.

fields.name: MsgMustBeInDraft
fields.fieldText: The record must be in Draft status before submitting for approval.

fields.name: MsgNoDocGen
fields.fieldText:
No document has been generated.
Please return to the record and select 'Generate Document' to generate a document for approval.

fields.name: MsgRecordsHaveBeenUpd
fields.fieldText: The following objects have been updated since the Agreement Document was generated:

fields.name: MsgToProceed
fields.fieldText: Select 'Continue' to continue submitting the approval request, or 'Cancel' to cancel the request.

fields.name: MsgPreDraftCheck
fields.fieldText: Please select Pre Draft Checklist Complete flag to confirm that all Pre Draft tasks are complete before submitting the record for approval.

fields.name: MsgChangeRecordsFound
fields.fieldText: Select 'Continue' to continue submitting the approval request, or 'Cancel' to cancel the request.

variables.description: The date time the agreement document was last generated
variables.name: DocumentGenerationDateTime

variables.description: The Last Modified date of the Facility
variables.name: FacilityLastMod

variables.description: The Last Modified date of the Legal Entity
variables.name: LegalEntityLastMod

variables.description: The Last Modified Date of the Licence
variables.name: LicenceLastMod

variables.description: Id of the parent network to retrive the network manager
variables.name: NetworkId

variables.description: The Last Modified date of the Network
variables.name: NetworkLastMod

variables.description: Id of the Parent Network Manager
variables.name: NetworkManagerId
